text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Aww, I've been rejected again. 
They're all so shy～!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Hey, do you want to go on a date with
me?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
A coastal drive, cutting through 
the wind! You're guaranteed to 
be thrilled and excited☆
